function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited involvement of architects and urban planners in response to pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate planning and design for mitigating contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and education on the impact of pandemics on the built environment, and integrate pandemic preparedness into architectural and urban planning guidelines","Technologies":"Educational programs, simulation tools for disease spread in built environment","People":"Architects, urban planners","Owner":"Government, architectural and urban planning institutions"},{"Description":"Limited focus on the social pillar in sustainability assessment rating systems","Impact":"Neglect of social factors that can affect contagious disease propagation in buildings","Mitigation":"Enhance the inclusion of social factors in sustainability assessment tools, and prioritize social impact alongside environmental and economic factors","Technologies":"Social impact assessment tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Sustainability assessors, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Sustainability assessment organizations, architectural and urban planning institutions"},{"Description":"Unequal priority given to key sustainability categories in rating systems","Impact":"Imbalance in addressing environmental, social, and economic factors that impact contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Review and adjust the weightage of sustainability categories to ensure balanced consideration of environmental, social, and economic factors","Technologies":"Sustainability impact modeling software, data analysis tools for assessing category importance","People":"Sustainability assessors, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Sustainability assessment organizations, architectural and urban planning institutions"}]}
